items.name: Construction Kit
items.description: The basic tool required to construct and deconstruct base elements and placeables.
items.operational_notes: Essential for all base building activities. The first step in establishing a foothold on Arrakis.

items.name: Blood Purifier
items.description: Extracts water from blood for faster hydration.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate.

items.name: Improved Blood Purifier
items.description: Improved version of the Blood Purifier for faster water extraction from blood.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate.

items.name: Small Ore Refinery
items.description: Refines basic ores into ingots.
items.operational_notes: Used for refining iron and copper ores.

items.name: Medium Ore Refinery
items.description: The Medium Ore Refinery is used to refine ores into ingots at a faster rate than the Small Ore Refinery.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate. Can refine multiple types of ores.

items.name: Large Ore Refinery
items.description: The Large Ore Refinery offers the highest refining capacity and efficiency for ores.
items.operational_notes: High power consumption but significantly faster refining speed.

items.name: Small Chemical Factory
items.description: Processes chemical resources at a basic level.
items.operational_notes: Used for basic chemical resource processing.

items.name: Medium Chemical Factory
items.description: A medium-sized factory for processing chemical resources with improved efficiency.
items.operational_notes: Used for refining chemical resources.

items.name: Spice Refinery
items.description: Processes Spice Sand into valuable Spice Melange.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate.

items.name: Medium Spice Refinery
items.description: Processes Spice Sand into Spice Melange more efficiently than the small Spice Refinery.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate.

items.name: Large Spice Refinery
items.description: A large refinery for processing Spice with maximum efficiency.
items.operational_notes: High power consumption but fastest Spice refining speed.

items.name: Fremen Deathstill
items.description: Extracts water from corpses. Requires power.
items.operational_notes: Needs corpses and power to operate.

items.name: Advanced Fremen Deathstill
items.description: Improved water extraction from corpses. Requires power.
items.operational_notes: More efficient than basic Deathstill. Needs corpses and power.

items.name: Fabricator
items.description: Crafts basic items and components up to Iron Products.
items.operational_notes: Essential for crafting basic items.

items.name: Garment Fabricator
items.description: Crafts garments up to Duraluminum Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting garments.

items.name: Advanced Garment Fabricator
items.description: Crafts advanced garments up to Plastinium Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting high-end garments.

items.name: Survival Fabricator
items.description: Crafts survival items up to Duraluminum Products.
items.operational_notes: Essential for crafting survival items.

items.name: Advanced Survival Fabricator
items.description: Crafts advanced survival items up to Plastinium Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting high-end survival gear.

items.name: Weapons Fabricator
items.description: Crafts weapons up to Duraluminum Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting weapons.

items.name: Advanced Weapons Fabricator
items.description: Crafts advanced weapons up to Plastinium Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting high-end weapons.

items.name: Vehicles Fabricator
items.description: Crafts vehicles up to Duraluminum Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting vehicles.

items.name: Advanced Vehicles Fabricator
items.description: Crafts advanced vehicles up to Plastinium Products.
items.operational_notes: Used for crafting advanced vehicles.

items.name: Sub-Fife Console
items.description: Manages base operations and defensive systems.
items.operational_notes: Essential for base management.

items.name: Advanced Sub-Fife Console
items.description: Advanced version of the Sub-Fife Console with enhanced base management capabilities.
items.operational_notes: Enhanced base management.

items.name: Fuel-Powered Generator
items.description: An early-game power generator that provides a basic amount of energy.
items.operational_notes: Low power output. Ideal for starter bases but becomes inefficient at scale.

items.name: Omnidirectional Wind Turbine
items.description: Generates 150W of power using wind energy. Requires Low-grade Lubricant.
items.operational_notes: Place outdoors. Passive power generation with lubricant supply.

items.name: Directional Wind Turbine
items.description: A high-efficiency power generator that harnesses wind power. Offers superior power density.
items.operational_notes: The most critical power upgrade for scaling industrial operations.

items.name: Spice-Powered Generator
items.description: Generates 1000W of power using Spice-infused Fuel Cells.
items.operational_notes: Requires Spice-infused Fuel Cells for operation.

items.name: Repair Station
items.description: Repairs damaged equipment and vehicles.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate.

items.name: Recycler
items.description: Recycles items into raw materials.
items.operational_notes: Requires power to operate.

items.name: Windtrap
items.description: A structure that passively collects water from the air's humidity. Essential for industrial-scale water production.
items.operational_notes: Must be placed outdoors to function. Water generation is passive and continues while offline.

items.name: Large Windtrap
items.description: Collects a large amount of water from the air. Requires filters.
items.operational_notes: Place outdoors. Passive water collection with filter supply.

items.name: Pentashield Surface Vertical
items.description: A vertical defensive energy shield for base protection.
items.operational_notes: Requires Sub-Fife Console for operation.

items.name: Pentashield Surface Horizontal
items.description: A horizontal defensive energy shield for base protection.
items.operational_notes: Requires Sub-Fife Console for operation.

items.name: Small Storage Container
items.description: A small storage container for items and resources.
items.operational_notes: Provides basic storage space for items.

items.name: Chest
items.description: A basic storage container for items and resources.
items.operational_notes: Provides storage space for items.

items.name: Storage Container
items.description: A storage container for items and resources.
items.operational_notes: Provides storage space for items.

items.name: Medium Storage Container
items.description: A medium storage container for items and resources.
items.operational_notes: Provides large storage space for items.

items.name: Water Cistern
items.description: Stores water for base operations.
items.operational_notes: Stores water for base use.

items.name: Medium Water Cistern
items.description: Stores a medium amount of water for base operations.
items.operational_notes: Stores water for base use.

items.name: Large Water Cistern
items.description: Stores a large amount of water for base operations.
items.operational_notes: Stores water for base use.

items.name: Makeshift Filter
items.description: A basic consumable filter required for the operation of a Windtrap.
items.operational_notes: Consumed over time by the Windtrap.

items.name: Standard Filter
items.description: A more advanced and likely longer-lasting filter for use in a Windtrap.
items.operational_notes: Higher tier filter, suggesting greater efficiency or duration.

items.name: Advanced Particulate Filter
items.description: A high-efficiency filter designed for advanced utilities, requiring rare materials.
items.operational_notes: Consumed over time by advanced utilities.

items.name: Plastone
items.description: An artificial composite of Silicon and Basalt used in sandstorm-resistant construction.
items.operational_notes: Premier building material for endgame construction.

items.name: Harkonnen Wall
items.description: Standard Harkonnen defensive wall. Sturdy and reliable for base protection.
items.operational_notes: Standard defensive wall. Can be upgraded to reinforced version.

items.name: Reinforced Harkonnen Wall
items.description: Heavy defensive wall with enhanced durability. Requires advanced materials.
items.operational_notes: Heavy defensive wall. Significantly more durable than standard walls.

items.name: Atreides Wall
items.description: Standard Atreides defensive wall. Balanced protection and efficiency.
items.operational_notes: Balanced defensive wall. Efficient use of materials.

items.name: Reinforced Atreides Wall
items.description: Strong defensive wall with excellent durability. Atreides engineering excellence.
items.operational_notes: Strong defensive wall with excellent material efficiency.

items.name: Fremen Wall
items.description: Basic Fremen wall using local materials. Simple but effective.
items.operational_notes: Basic wall using local materials. Cost-effective for early game.

items.name: Harkonnen Door
items.description: Standard Harkonnen door. Reliable access control for base security.
items.operational_notes: Standard door for base access control.

items.name: Harkonnen Security Door
items.description: High-security door with advanced locking mechanisms. Maximum protection.
items.operational_notes: High-security door requiring power for electronic locks.

items.name: Atreides Door
items.description: Standard Atreides door. Efficient design with good security.
items.operational_notes: Efficient door design with good material usage.

items.name: Atreides Security Door
items.description: High-security door with advanced Atreides engineering. Excellent protection.
items.operational_notes: High-security door with efficient power usage.

items.name: Fremen Door
items.description: Basic Fremen door using local materials. Simple but functional.
items.operational_notes: Basic door using local materials. Cost-effective.

items.name: Harkonnen Foundation
items.description: Strong foundation for heavy Harkonnen structures. Built to last.
items.operational_notes: Strong foundation supporting heavy structures.

items.name: Atreides Foundation
items.description: Balanced foundation for Atreides structures. Efficient and reliable.
items.operational_notes: Balanced foundation with efficient material usage.

items.name: Fremen Foundation
items.description: Basic foundation using local materials. Simple but effective.
items.operational_notes: Basic foundation using local materials. Cost-effective.

items.name: Harkonnen Roof
items.description: Sturdy roof for Harkonnen buildings. Provides excellent protection from the elements.
items.operational_notes: Sturdy roof providing excellent weather protection.

items.name: Atreides Roof
items.description: Efficient roof for Atreides buildings. Good protection with material efficiency.
items.operational_notes: Efficient roof design with good material usage.

items.name: Fremen Roof
items.description: Basic roof using local materials. Provides essential protection.
items.operational_notes: Basic roof using local materials. Cost-effective protection.

items.name: Fremen Death Still
items.description: Fremen Death Still - Refineries

items.name: Fuel-Powered Geneerator
items.description: Fuel-Powered Geneerator - Utilities

items.name: Wind Turbine Omni-Directional
items.description: Wind Turbine Omni-Directional - Utilities

items.name: Wind Turbine Directional
items.description: Wind Turbine Directional - Utilities

items.name: Spice Powered Generator
items.description: Spice Powered Generator - Utilities
